page.title: 16THE KILMARNOCK STANDARD
page.content: THE KILMARNOCK STANDARD IS AN 80 PAGE WEEKLY COSTING 22p. HAVING FINISHED A CAMPAIGN TO RAISE BY RAFFLE MONEY FOR THE BAND AID APPEAL A CHARITY ORGANISATION AIMED AT FEEDING THE POOR IN THE THIRD WORLD,THE PAPER HAS NOW STARTED A CHRISTMAS APPEAL FOR TOYS TO BE DELIVERED TO BETWEEN 400 AND 600 NEEDY FAMILIES IN KILMARNOCK. THE USUAL FEATURES OF THIS PAPER ARE: REPORTS OF CASES FROM KILMARNOCK SHERIFF COURT, PHOTOGRAPHS OF GOLDEN WEDDINGS,INFANT CLASSES IN LOCAL SCHOOLS AND WEDDINGS; ANNOUNCEMENTS OF BIRTHS,DEATHS AND MARRIAGES. THERE ARE 46 PAGES OF PAID ADVERTISEMENTS. THE BACK PAGES CONTAIN SPORTS NEWS COVERING FOOTBALL SENIOR,JUNIOR AND AMATEUR,RUGBY,BOWLING ETC.
